answers.answer: Yours are pretty close to normal. You should be fine. I have gestational diabetes and my 1 hour was over 280 as well as my 2 hour and it was still high by my 3 hour. They didn't put be on insulin just changed what I was eating and it made a huge difference. If they want yours to be lower they might just change your eating schedule to breakfast, snack, lunch, snack, dinner, snack. It helps keep your sugar level normal and it's better for the baby either way. :) you should nothing to worry about
Omg kperez i love you lol im just so nervous. Im glad yours regulated. Anyone else??? When are you due and what are you having kperez?
Due date is Feb 8th but I'm measuring close to 2 weeks early so it's getting closer. Having a girl,naming her Maya Gabriella :) how about you?
Aww how beautiful! Due april 5th, its a boy naming him Dean Allen ... I think hell come earlier but i hope not
Anyone else w input on.their results?

I was border line gestational diabetes so again no medication just cut out the rubbish changed my breakfast to oats instead of sugary breakfast and cut out sugary drink I just drink water or sugar free juice now, I was shocked how much sugar is in drinks I use to drink the small bottles of ribeana and they are 46% of your daily sugar allowance just in one bottle!
Fran do you know what your numbers were? Maybe i should start eating breakfast
In from England our numbers are different to yours  i think it's something like under 6.0 is ok 6.1-6.8 is border line and 6.9+ is diabetes mine was 6.1 so I was low border line
Oh ok. Anyone else in the US?

question: Hey ladies, so I did my 3 hour fast on 12/23 and have yet to hear back from my doctor's office and of course I have called but the dr has been on call and they say she has yet to read them ... yes I know pretty ridiculous but I am going crazy, I know usually they say no news is good news, but does anyone on here know how to interpret their results? Or does anyone have their lab results that they can compare mine too whether you have it or not, that way I can know if I am normal or if I am closer to having it. I googled results and for one of my fasts I was only over by like 3 points, but any help would be greatly appreciated thanks!Normal Fast Glucose Level: 84mg/dLAfter 1 hour: 116mg/dLAfter 2 hour: 158 mg/dL according to online this is over by 2 or 3After 3 hour: 126 mg/dLAll others are significantly lower. When I went in for my 1 hour, I was extremely sick and out with the flu and chugged lots of juice, but I didn't expect to take it that day. After my 1 hour when I was sick my reading was 197/dL ... a huge difference from 197 to 84.If anyone could help ease my mind I'd surely appreciate it.Thanks Ladiesxoxo
title: Gestational Diabetes Test Results PLZ HELP
